name: Monster Catcher
description:
Monster Catcher is a fast action, single player game for the Commodore 64! If you like Rodland, Bubble Bobble, and a little bit of Smash TV then you’ll love Monster Catcher!

Monsters have invaded, and the bunnies are in trouble! Grab your magic wand and use your capture spell to save the day! But careful you don't trap a bunny by mistake!

  • Randomly generated levels
  • 40 levels plus an end game boss
  • 4 different areas
  • 8 different enemies with lots of varied behaviours

Controls:
Joystick in port 2.

Works on PAL C64 hardware and emulators like Vice. Should work on TheC64 Mini and Maxi although I haven't tested.

Code, art, sound and music by Monte Boyd.

Testing by Łukasz Bobrecki (Bob8bit) and Vinny Mainolfi.
